option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
filename of the grdmap format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Convert a grdmap format file to a grid format file.

description.p: Convert a grdmap format file to a grid format file.
The converted file is written to standard output.

example.description: Convert the grdmap format file "20040402.grdmap" to the grid format file "20040402.grd".
